lines: Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2dce320>

lines: Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2db41c8>

lines: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e055a0>

lines: Shared joy is a double joy; shared sorrow is half sorrow.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2dee828>

lines: Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e3bb00>

lines: Friends are medicine for a wounded heart and vitamins for a hopeful soul.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e24e78>

lines: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e0e1f0>

lines: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e65540>

lines: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e4a6f0>

lines: It takes courage for people to listen to their own goodness and act on it.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e8f340>

lines: Courage doesn’t mean you aren’t afraid. Courage means you don’t let fear stop you.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2e7c2e0>

lines: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2ec4518>

lines: The essence of life is not in the great victories and grand failures, but in the simple joys.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2eac6e8>

lines: The joy of giving is the greatest joy of life.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2ef4948>

lines: Happiness—not in another place, but this place... not for another hour, but for this hour.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2edd5e0>

lines: Joy is the kind of happiness that doesn’t depend on what happens.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2f254a8>

lines: You really can change the world if you care enough.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2f0df60>

lines: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2f5e668>

lines: Taking care of yourself doesn't mean me first, it means me too.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2f46270>

lines: The simple act of caring is heroic.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2f8f498>

lines: Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2f77d98>

lines: Waste no more time arguing about what a good person should be. Be one.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2fc46e8>

lines: What you do makes a difference and you have to decide what kind of a difference you want to make.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2fac868>

lines: How wonderful that no one need wait a single moment to improve the world.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de30014f8>

lines: Don’t just aspire to make a living. Aspire to make a difference.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de2fea1e0>

lines: Each one of us can make a difference. Together we make a change.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de3032968>

lines: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de301b290>

lines: Some succeed because they are destined to, but most succeed because they are determined to.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de3062cd0>

lines: Sometimes there is nothing you can do, and in those times, you must do something anyway.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de304b530>

lines: I believe success is achieved by ordinary people with extraordinary determination.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de30ab840>

lines: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de30937b8>

lines: The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de30ead88>

lines: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude.
author: <Author:0x00007f0de30c87b0>
